attributes.action: pressure the Californian governor, Arnold Schwarzenegger, to send Paris Hilton to prison for the full 45 days of her jail sentence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On her Myspace page, Paris Hilton is encouraging people to sign a petition to be presented to Arnold Schwarzenegger in an attempt to avoid her 45 day jail sentence. 

The page goes on to claim that Paris should be spared jail because "She provides beauty and excitement to (most of) our otherwise mundane lives." 

We the undersigned believe that Paris can liven up our mundane lives far more behind bars that at liberty, and urge the governor to press for the maximum sentence.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
